email_body: [IMAGE] NCI Marketing Web Alert [IMAGE]Phillip [IMAGE] We make losing weight easy! Our personalized diet plans will guide you to lose weight and keep it off forever! Stop wishing for a change! Your personalized diet plan includes: [IMAGE]Customized plans geared for your needs [IMAGE]A personal diet consultant to help guide you [IMAGE]Daily and weekly updates to your diet plan [IMAGE]State of the art weight loss techniques [IMAGE]Weekly chats with medical doctors [IMAGE] and much, much more... [IMAGE] Click here to get started now! [IMAGE] "Your diet program is so easy. Every time I did another diet I had to change my life completely. 7StepDiet helped slowly change my life for the better and helped me lose weight quickly." -Beth G. "Your stress relief area is wonderful. I don't know what I would do without it. Each day I just follow one your stress relief tips and I feel 100% more relaxed and confident? not to mention, I lost over 10 pounds in my first week!" -Sandra K.
